# Role / Persona Template

Use this template when adding a new role or updating an existing role entry.

- Role name:
- Summary: (1â€“2 sentence description)
- Primary responsibilities:
  - Responsibility 1
  - Responsibility 2
- Decision authority: (what decisions can this role make independently)
- Collaborates with: (list roles and short notes on interaction)
- Escalation path: (who to notify and when)
- Typical artifacts: (e.g., test plans, change records, acceptance sign-off)
- Example scenarios: (short, concrete examples)
- Acceptance criteria for this role entry:
  - Content aligns with existing process docs
  - Role interactions are clear
  - Stakeholder review performed (if required)
